invalidRequest.title: Invalid Request
invalidRequest.message: The unsubscribe link appears to be invalid. Please contact support if you need assistance.

notFound.title: Not Found
notFound.message: We could not find this subscription in our system. You may have already been unsubscribed.

alreadyUnsubscribed.title: Already Unsubscribed
alreadyUnsubscribed.message: You have already been unsubscribed. You will not receive further emails from us at {email}.

success.title: Unsubscribed Successfully
success.message: You have been successfully unsubscribed. You will no longer receive emails from us at {email}.
success.farewell: We're sorry to see you go, but we respect your choice. May your inbox be peaceful and your stories ever adventurous.

error.title: Error
error.message: An error occurred while processing your unsubscribe request. Please try again later or contact support.
